name.baseName: Industrial fatty acids ; Oil grease ; Hydrolysis ; All sizes; NESPS2
工业用脂肪酸 ; 油脂 ; 水解工艺 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysicochemical treatment + biological treatment + activated sludge process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysicochemical treatment + biological treatment + activated sludge process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集涉及工业规模的脂肪酸和油脂水解工艺。这个过程在生产各种化工产品中都有应用，需要将脂肪分解成脂肪酸的步骤。这个过程常见于制造肥皂、洗涤剂以及其他多种油脂化工产品。提到的'末端处理管理'表明该数据集还包括用于管理产生的污染的处理技术，特别是针对废水、化学需氧量和氨氮排放的处理。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码26,四级代码2662文件，在完整版文件中第4111页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为工业用脂肪酸，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废水量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysicochemical treatment + biological treatment + activated sludge process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是物理化学法+生物处理法+活性污泥法，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=设施年耗电量（千瓦时）/(设备功率(千瓦)×年运行小时数(小时))。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysicochemical treatment + biological treatment + activated sludge process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是物理化学法+生物处理法+活性污泥法，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=设施年耗电量（千瓦时）/(设备功率(千瓦)×年运行小时数(小时))。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为化学需氧量
